basics.name: Bibiana Garcia
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2025.

highlights: Assisted with assigning roles using Remedy (Helix).
Streamlined documents in excel and PowerPoint using Visual Basic to decrease the number of hours it takes to produce both quantitative and qualitive metrics for upper management.
Created workflow documentation to assist with management of programs and turnover.
Performed 320 hours of career development and leadership training.
Interpret data related to electrical power generating systems and aircraft arresting systems to prevent potential weapon systems failure.
Advise on problems installing and repairing electrical power production equipment and aircraft arresting systems.
Maintain records. Install and operate electrical power plants, distribution equipment, automatic transfer panels, and aircraft arresting systems.
Maintain and repair electrical power generating equipment, automatic transfer panels, and aircraft arresting systems.
